div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1509 Palestine, 1966 or earlier Burial: c. 320 B.C. (Meshorer) Contents: c. 60 AE Alexander III: 15 (Ace) Tyre: c. 40 (lion's mask/murex or murex and dolphin; unpublished) Disposition: Y. Meshorer some; Copen- hagen 1 Information from Y. Meshorer
